ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 152
ygData.msgSnippet: ... begining, nothing as been change for the wizzards... They just change ... the patch , the casting time . I have tested BEFORE and after : no change (that
ygData.messageBody:
>i just read the new patch message.. Damn.... From the
begining, nothing as been change for the wizzards... They just change
>during
the patch , the casting time . I have tested BEFORE and after : no >change
(that a clock can see, so it s surely a change of let s say 0,001 >second or
something like that.In other words : nothing.
>All patch just power up the race... Now the druid dot spel are fast like
>hell, necro same. And us ?? From the beginning, we have major bug who are
>not resolved and they do nothing for us...

Hey hey, don't worry about it. I've been playing both a Shaman & Druid to
get a feel for it, but nothing compares to a Wizard. I'm thinking of
dropping my Druid character because she just plain sucks. Druids are good
solo and group characters up to about 20level, then that's it. All my high
45+ level friends tell me they never invite Druids in their parties
anymore...but Wizards are ALWAYS welcome.
At high levels, a Druid will not have good enough armor to tank...so they
essentially become weak Wizards.

By that time, a Wizard of equal level will have strong shields and DD
spells, AND all the teleport spells of a Druid. So what about a Druid's DOT

spells, you can't kite Lady Voxx. :) (or can you? hehe)
Nor will a Druid's heal spells be worthy of a Cleric. So why have them?

The grass always looks greener somewhere else, but trust me....other
characters are envious of a Wizard's spells as well.

We *maybe* need to be tweaked here and there...but stop comparing us to
other characters. It will get us nowhere. We have a few 50Level Wizards on

our server that have demonstrated the effectiveness of our spells.

IMHO,
-- Lim'Dul
Veeshan

----------------------------------------

I am not sure you know how weak we are.... You tell about dd ? ok. Do you
know that your best spel at level 50 only does 625 dommage ???? And that the
best dd spel for DRUID is 615 (and they buy it IN A FUCKING SHOP)????
Magician get a BOLT who deal 900 dommage at level 49 (AND THEY BUY IT TOO IN
A FUCKING SHOP!)... ok it s a bolt so dificult to cast by WTF we must have
the best dd spel no ????? With nearly the same mana/ratio.... Don t speak
about ice comet, you never never will have it (unless you have 40 friend
level 50 and who are ready to spare it with you...)... And oh yes : you best
dd spel is fire based so you can NOT hit fire giant (nothing in solusek b in
fact)and nagafen (who is one of the mob carrying the rune). So you use you
level 39 sple at level 50.. that s pretty cool no ? At level 34 you have a
dd of 315 .. cool the magician have a bolt who deal 345 at 34 ...... So i am
sure you realise how weak we are right now :). People ask us to group ? Yes
cause they THINK we are the best dd caster... And it s not true at level 23
you use a stupid level 16 spel. From 24 to 29 we are the best dd caster yep.
But from 34 to the end, no way we are nothing. I have one friend who is
level 50 dark elfe on karana (menahemen a french speaking guy coming from
suisse). He just stop playing at level 50 not because he don t like his
wizzard cause he was really bored about what verant does to us (i mean we
are undepowere dlike hell so we don t hit the major mob of the game as
nagafen and lady vox :( ). Some of you may (again) tell me : ohh stop
spaming, just play another classe if you don t like this one, we are fine
with it... Ok wait till high level and we will see.. So np continue play but
never never hope to be (not the strongest) a regular class... Just hope to
become the weakest class in the game but some like it ! (as i do :) )


yakos
level 26 wizzard karana

p.s. a druid is 15 times more useful then me in a group.... People just don
t know we are so weak....
